name: Adventure Medical Kits C-Splint
description: This innovative lightweight, malleable splint allows you to stabilize injuries to help safely evacuate an injured person from the backcountry.Made of a pliable thin aluminum alloy sandwiched between 2 layers of closed-cell foam.Can be folded flat or rolled for packing.Reusable, and can be shaped or cut to fit.Waterproof and stable at exteme temperatures.Can be worn for x-rays.
